hints.content:
When **multiplying** by $10$, we shift each digit $1$ place value to the **left**.

When **dividing** by $10$, we shift each digit $1$ place value to the **right**.

When **dividing** by $10$, we shift each digit $1$ place value to the right.

Number | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$9{,}090$ |$\searrow\goldD{9}$ | $\searrow\purpleD{0}$ | $\searrow\blueD{9}$ | $\searrow\cancel0$  
$9{,}090 \div 10$ | |$\goldD{9}$ | $\purpleD{0}$ |$\blueD{9}$

$\goldD9{,}\purpleD0\blueD9\greenD0 \div 10=\goldD9\purpleD0\blueD9$

When **multiplying** by $10$, we shift each digit $1$ place value to the left.

Number | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$99$| |$\swarrow\blueD{9}$ | $\swarrow\greenD{9}$  
$10 \times 99$ |$\blueD9$ |$\greenD9$ | $0$

$10 \times \blueD9\greenD9=\blueD9\greenD90$

When **multiplying** by $10$, we shift each digit $1$ place value to the left.

Number | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |
$900$ | | $\swarrow\purpleD{9}$ | $\swarrow\blueD{0}$ | $\swarrow\greenD{0}$  
$900 \times 10$ | $\purpleD{9}$ |$\blueD{0}$ |$\greenD0$ | $0$

$\purpleD9\blueD0\greenD0 \times 10=\purpleD9{,}\blueD0\greenD00$

question.content:
**Move the cards to match each expression.**
